alert.note: Alert for Greene (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 09 at 6:40PM CDT until July 09 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Mississippi, including the following county, Greene. * WHEN...Until 945 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 638 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated slow moving thunderstorms producing very heavy rain across portions of central and northeastern Greene County. 1 to 3 inches of rain has fallen during the past hour. Excessive runoff from heavy rainfall will cause flooding along creeks and streams, local roadways and low lying areas. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Leakesville, Jonathan, Clark, Dueitt, Bradley, Hillman, Rounsaville, Old Avera and Knobtown. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
